recipe.title: Couscous with Dates
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon finely grated fresh orange zest
1 tablespoon finely chopped dried pitted dates
instructions: Bring water, oil, zest, and salt to a boil in a 1- to 1 1/2-quart heavy saucepan. Stir in couscous and dates, then cover pan and remove from heat. Let stand, covered, 5 minutes. Fluff couscous with a fork and stir in scallion greens.
Bring water, oil, zest, and salt to a boil in a 1- to 1 1/2-quart heavy saucepan. Stir in couscous and dates, then cover pan and remove from heat. Let stand, covered, 5 minutes.
Fluff couscous with a fork and stir in scallion greens.
